about: I am a Postdoctoral Researcher at the Department of Clinical Medicine, University of Bergen, Norway.

My research focuses on the intersection of Toxicology and Microplastics, specifically investigating their impact on human health. I am dedicated to understanding how environmental contaminants affect biological systems and contributing to the scientific understanding of plastic pollution.

research_interests.title: Microplastics & Human Health
research_interests.description: Investigating the presence, transport, and toxicological effects of microplastics in human tissues and fluids.

research_interests.title: Toxicology
research_interests.description: Assessing the impacts of environmental pollutants on cellular health and physiological functions.
